subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{zh-ref|Baxter and Sagart (2014)}} propose that it is from {{och-l|清|clear|tr=*tsʰeŋ}} with the intransitivizing/stativizing prefix ''*N-''. Compare {{cog|hmx-pro|*ntshji̯əŋ||clear}}, whence {{cog|mww|ntshiab}}.

Alternatively, it is perhaps derived from {{och-l|星|star}}: "become starry" > "weather clearing during the night" > "clearing when the sun is coming out" ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
